## User Journey Map

### New User Journey
```
1. Discovery
   â†“
2. Read README â†’ See Community section
   â†“
3. Check DISCUSSIONS.md guide
   â†“
4. Browse existing discussions
   â†“
5. Ask question in Q&A or General
   â†“
6. Get help, learn the toolkit
   â†“
7. Create first unit â†’ Share in Unit Design Showcase
   â†“
8. Become active community member
```

### Contributor Journey
```
1. Use toolkit, identify improvement
   â†“
2. Search Ideas category for similar suggestions
   â†“
3. Post feature request in Ideas
   â†“
4. Discuss with community
   â†“
5. Move to Development category
   â†“
6. Implement feature
   â†“
7. Submit Pull Request
   â†“
8. Share result in Show & Tell
```

### Designer Journey
```
1. Learn toolkit basics (General, Q&A)
   â†“
2. Browse unit designs for inspiration
   â†“
3. Create units using toolkit
   â†“
4. Share in Unit Design Showcase
   â†“
5. Get feedback, iterate
   â†“
6. Design weapons in Weapons & Ballistics
   â†“
7. Create formations
   â†“
8. Build complete faction/nation
   â†“
9. Share complete library in Data Libraries
   â†“
10. Showcase final project in Show & Tell
```

## Templates & Categories Matrix

| Template | Primary Category | Secondary Categories | Purpose |
|----------|------------------|----------------------|---------|
| unit-design.md | Unit Design Showcase | Show & Tell | Share units |
| weapon-design.md | Weapons & Ballistics | Show & Tell | Discuss weapons |
| feature-request.md | Ideas | Development | Suggest features |
| technical-support.md | Technical Support | Q&A | Get help |
| data-library.md | Data Libraries | Show & Tell | Share complete sets |

## Discussion Lifecycle

```
1. CREATE
   â””â”€ Use template or freeform
      â””â”€ Post in appropriate category
         â””â”€ Add labels/tags

2. ENGAGE
   â””â”€ Community responds
      â””â”€ Discussion evolves
         â””â”€ Solutions emerge

3. RESOLVE
   â””â”€ Q&A: Mark answer as accepted
   â””â”€ Ideas: Move to Issues or close
   â””â”€ Support: Problem solved
   â””â”€ Showcase: Feedback received

4. ARCHIVE
   â””â”€ Lock if complete
      â””â”€ Pin if valuable
         â””â”€ Reference in docs
```

## Moderation Flow

```
New Discussion
      â”‚
      â–¼
Auto-label (future automation)
      â”‚
      â–¼
Community engagement
      â”‚
      â”œâ”€ Quality discussion â†’ Pin if valuable
      â”‚
      â”œâ”€ Needs attention â†’ Moderator review
      â”‚
      â”œâ”€ Convert to Issue â†’ Good bug/feature
      â”‚
      â”œâ”€ Resolved â†’ Mark as solved/close
      â”‚
      â””â”€ Off-topic â†’ Redirect to correct category
```

## Quick Decision Tree

**"Where should I post?"**

```
Do you have a question?
â”œâ”€ YES â†’ Specific question? â†’ Q&A
â””â”€ NO  â†’ General discussion? â†’ General

Want to share something?
â”œâ”€ Unit design â†’ Unit Design Showcase
â”œâ”€ Weapon system â†’ Weapons & Ballistics
â”œâ”€ Formation/nation â†’ Formations & Nations
â”œâ”€ Complete library â†’ Data Libraries
â””â”€ Finished project â†’ Show & Tell

Need help with a problem?
â”œâ”€ Installation/error â†’ Technical Support
â”œâ”€ How to use feature â†’ Q&A
â””â”€ Bug report â†’ GitHub Issues (not Discussions)

Want to suggest something?
â”œâ”€ Feature idea â†’ Ideas
â”œâ”€ Code contribution â†’ Development
â””â”€ General feedback â†’ General

Are you a maintainer?
â””â”€ Official announcement â†’ Announcements
```
